cont.entity_a: Difficult to set up, especially for those unfamiliar with embedded Linux systems. Setup requires IT knowledge; not beginner-friendly.
cont.entity_b: Easy to install with the provided CD, but may require tech support for Mac users. Setup process can be challenging for non-technical users. Setup instructions could be clearer.

cont.entity_a: Advanced features suitable for SMB environments, including VPN and remote access.
cont.entity_b: Good compatibility with a variety of devices, including gaming consoles. Some models require additional configuration for optimal performance.

cont.entity_a: Poor wireless performance, especially in mixed environments (11/54Mbps).
cont.entity_b: Good wireless range and speed for G standard. Solid product with good signal range.

cont.entity_a: Frequent crashes and issues with maintaining a stable connection. Requires frequent manual restarts.
cont.entity_b: Stable performance once set up, with minimal need for restarts. Generally reliable and durable, suitable for long-term use.

cont.entity_a: Inadequate support from Linksys and issues with firmware updates. Mixed reviews on customer service responsiveness.
cont.entity_b: Customer service is helpful in resolving setup issues.

cont.entity_a: Not recommended for VPN use; issues with QuickVPN support.
The price is considered a drawback.

cont.entity_b: Issues with older models not supporting third-party firmware.
